home.dallTips: Supports DALL-E-3, allowing you to easily transform your ideas into extremely accurate images. Subsequent support for GPT-4-Vision will also be provided.
home.desc: Le-AI is an open-source LLM conversation assistant designed to help you improve learning, work, and life efficiency.
home.gptModelTips: Supports the latest GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 models simultaneously, and responds quickly to help you solve most problems.
home.ttsTips: Text-to-speech, 6 different emotionally rich tones to help you find the tone you need

features.apiProxyTips: Provide API proxy services for convenient use
features.chatEverywhereTips: Includes multi-platform clients can be used in most scenarios
features.continuousUpdatesTips: Will continue to iterate and constantly add new features
features.dataSecurityTips: All data is stored on your device and will be no leakage
features.formatTips: Provides good support for markdown format
features.freeTips: Provide your OpenAI API Key and you can use it for free
features.noLoginRequiredTips: No need to log in, can be used directly
features.quickResponseTips: Respond to feedback in the first instance

apiProxy.dashboardTips: Record your personal information, token balance, and monthly consumption in detail
apiProxy.ownApiKeyTips: Create your own API Key to manage and use Le-AI
apiProxy.usageTips: Store your API Token consumption records for easy viewing of Token consumption

faq.a1: Yes. Le-AI permanently supports free usage. You just need to configure the OpenAI locally and you can use it for free
faq.a2: If your OpenAI API Key has the permissions for GPT-4/DALL-E-3, you can use it for free. You can also try purchasing Le-AI Premium to unlock features like GPT-4/DALL-E-3
faq.a3: All data of Le-AI is stored locally on the browser/client and will never be actively uploaded
faq.q1: Can I use it for free?
faq.q3: Will it leak my privacy and data?
